structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.catch_line: Administrative powers of cabinet -- Annual directory of alcohol and other drug abuse facilities available.

text.section: The cabinet shall prepare and publish annually a directory of all alcohol and other drug abuse facilities and services available in the Commonwealth. This directory shall be made available upon request.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.
